definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: This calamity was caused by evil spirits, not because the gods were jealous.
sentences.chinese: 固鬼蜮之爲災，豈神靈之有妒。

definition: the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
the hidden and the visible/that which can be seen and that which cannot/darkness and light/night and day/wisdom and ignorance/evil and good/the living and the dead/men and ghosts
lit. nest of devils/place occupied by sinister forces
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
old variant of 豐都|丰都[Feng1 du1]/Fengdu county Chongqing municipality/name of a famous necropolis
many things arranged together, or connected together/to go on limitlessly
Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
demon in Buddhism/poltergeist in temple that plays tricks on monks and has a taste for their food
